content: परिशीलनं {@--1@} Touch, contact (<ab>lit.</ab>). ललितलवंगलतापरिशीलनकोमलमलयसभीरे <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; so वदनकमलपरिशीलनभिलित &c. <ls n="Gīt.">11.</ls> {@--2@} Constant contact, intercourse, or correspondence. {@--3@} Study, application or attachment (to a thing), steady or fixed pursuit; काव्यार्थ° <ls>S. D.</ls>
